item.title: A Vision of Algocratic Elections
item.description: I am going to write some smart introductory stuff here. Argumentum Ad Populum For a while this was the best we had - it was all we had. It seemed like a perfectly reasonable path to consult the hive mind on important matters - a common solution for which we can see many examples throughout history. Ostrakismos, the ancient Athenian practice of voting to banish certain individuals from the community – which is where the phrase ’ostracism’ originates from – utilized the same principle of achieving group consensus to determine a citizen’s social fitness.
